en_text: May survive when HP is reduced to 0 (HP>70%)

jp_skill.name: マチルダの秘薬
jp_skill.raw_description: HPが0になる攻撃を受けてもふんばることがある。

kr_skill.raw_description: HP가 0이 되는 공격을 받아도 버틸 때가 있다

na_skill.name: Matilda's Medicine
na_skill.raw_description: May survive when HP is reduced to 0
